text: Esperanza Guadalupe Llori Abarca (born 1962) is an Ecuadorian politician. She was prefect of Orellana Province from 2005 to 2008 and again from 2009 to 2018. She is a member of the Pachakutik Plurinational Unity Movement. She was the President of the National Assembly of Ecuador from May 2021 to May 2022. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the National Assembly of Ecuador Category:Orellana Province Category:1962 births
title: Guadalupe Llori
